title: Preview Worker: Implement Queue & Concurrency Controls
body:
## Description
Configure concurrency and queue length, exposing env vars PREVIEW_MAX_CONCURRENCY (default 1) and PREVIEW_QUEUE_MAX (default 20).

## Priority
P0

## Estimated Effort
4-6 hours

## Acceptance Criteria
- Worker respects PREVIEW_MAX_CONCURRENCY and does not process more than N jobs in parallel.
- When queue length > PREVIEW_QUEUE_MAX, new preview creation API returns 429 with helpful message.
- Queue length gauge metric preview_worker_queue_size is exported.

## Implementation Notes
- For BullMQ: queue.pause()/resume for backpressure or reject new enqueues.

## Labels
feature, phase-g, preview-worker, backend
## Assignee
developer
